entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 10:33 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: N 65 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
